promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic elephant fighting-type pokemon with white tusks. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Tuskarrage, a a massive basic elephant fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Gentle Kick, Steamin' Mad Strike. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "fighting" or "Tuskarrage". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, elephant-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This titanic pachyderm thrives in rugged terrains. It's known for its deceptively soft kick and anger-fueled blows.
